rukus.text: vekale-llezine keferu lirusulihim lenuhricennekum min ardina ev lete`udunne fi milletina. feevha ileyhim rabbuhum lenuhlikenne-zzalimin
velenuskinennekumu-l'arda mim ba`dihim. zalike limen hafe mekami vehafe ve`id
miv veraihi cehennemu veyuska mim main sadid
yetecerra`uhu vela yekadu yusiguhu veye'tihi-lmevtu min kulli mekaniv vema huve bimeyyit. vemiv veraihi `azabun galiz
meselu-llezine keferu birabbihim a`maluhum keramadin-steddet bihi-rrihu fi yevmin `asif. la yakdirune mimma kesebu `ala sey'. zalike huve-ddalalu-lbe`id
elem tera enne-llahe haleka-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakk. iy yese' yuzhibkum veye'ti bihalkin cedid

veberazu lillahi cemi`an fekale-ddu`afau lillezine-stekberu inna kunna lekum tebe`an fehel entum mugnune `anna min `azabi-llahi min sey'. kalu lev hedane-llahu lehedeynakum. sevaun `aleyna ecezi`na em saberna ma lena mim mehis
